title: Avanquest Fix-It Utilities 9.0.2.3-keygen incl
description:
Diagnose & Fix Windows Problems
Fix-It Utilities runs over 100 tests to uncover problems that slow down your computer and fixes all of them so that your computer runs again like new.

Optimize Computer Performance
Fix-It Utilities finds and removes wasted disk space, repairs hard drive problems and speeds up Windows startup.

95+ Diagnostic Tests

Fix-It Utilities checks your system hardware such as memory, hard drives, network cards and more to ensure everything is working properly.

Registry Repair & Maintenance
Speed your PC performance by defragmenting, cleaning, fixing and optimizing your WindowsÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® registry.

System Optimizer
Users can select profiles to optimize their systems for certain PC tasks, like Gaming, Multimedia, Office tasks and Security. One click and you're optimized for maximum performance.

Windows Rescue CD
Fix and restore your PC when your computer wonÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t boot with the included Windows rescue CD. If you are downloading Fix-It Utilities, you can create a Windows Rescue CD directly from the software.

Recover Lost Photos, Music & Data
Accidentally deleted your photos, music or personal data? Instantly recover deleted files, photos, music, video, email and more with Fix-It Utilities built-in recovery features.

Securely Erase Your Data
Help prevent your data from falling into the wrong hands by securely erasing data from your hard drive. You'll be protected from Identity Theft as File Shredder meets U.S. Department of Defense Security cleaning standards, ensuring that erased data is completely unrecoverable.

One-Step PC Tune-Up Wizards for Easy Maintenance

One-Click Performance and Security Wizard Solutions are the answer to your regular PC needs. Choose from the Optimize, CleanUp, FixUp & Security Wizards or run the Comprehensive Wizard to take care of everything automatically.Optimize Wizard
Optimizes your hard drive and system registry for improved system performance.

FixUp Wizard
Diagnoses hard drive problems, fixes and repairs your Windows registry and tests your hardware.

CleanUp Wizard
Backs up your system files, cleans out the hard drive clutter and regains wasted disk space.

World-Class, Integrated Anti-Virus & Anti-Spyware Protection

Award-Winning, Real-Time PC Protection
Fix-It Utilities removes existing viruses, malware and spyware from your PC and prevents future infections by monitoring your computer for any malicious behavior. Get real-time protection from viruses and spyware in email messages, attachment and Internet downloads.

    * Virus, spyware & malware detection & removal
    * NEW! Prevents rootkits and keyloggers from stealing personal data
    * NEW! Real-time protection against any malicious behavior
    * NEW! Hourly updates to protect you against the latest threats



WhatÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s New & Improved in Version 9

Internet Speed Optimizer - NEW!
The new Internet Speed tool accelerates browser, download and surfing speeds up to 80% for Internet Explorer and Mozilla Firefox browsers.

Windows Optimizer Tool ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ NEW!
This new tool improves Microsoft Office Application security settings, Internet security settings, addresses registry vulnerabilities and cleans the printer queue. Microsoft Office and Internet browser have security flaws where hackers can send viruses and spyware through. Fix-It Utilities fixes the security settings protecting you against attacks. Files that you want to print can get stuck in the printer queue. When this happens often the only way to get the file out is to restart your computer. Fix-It Utilities removes the file(s) that are causing the printing problem without restarting your PC.

Fix-It Utilities anti-virus and anti-spyware tools have added significant new security features to ensure you are always protect against the latest threats.

    * NEW! Rootkit Detection and Removal
    * NEW! Real Time Protection Shields
    * NEW! Behavior based malware identification

PC Diagnostics - IMPROVED
Fix-It Utilities PC diagnostics have been improved to full support testing of hardware for Vista computers.

Temp File Cleaners - IMPROVED
The temp file cleaners now feature an option to permanently shred the selected temp files. This improves the security of your PC by protecting you against any potentially malicious temp files.

Active Intelligence ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ IMPROVED

Fix-It Utilities enables users to reduce start up times by 25%, improve read-write performance by 20% and prevents data loss by identifying hard drive problems before they happen.

File Shredder Tool - IMPROVED
Fix-It Utilities file shredder tool now features two additional options for securely shredding sensitive files and strengthening your protection against identity theft. Users can select 1, 3, 7 or 35 pass options. With increased wiping options, users can ensure their sensitive data is securely deleted from even the most aggressive file recovery software.
